snippet.title: Reckless Racing
snippet.description:
Roaring engines, squealing tires and amazing graphics to boot! We know y'all want it and we guarantee that Reckless Racing delivers. Reckless Racing mixes old-school top-down racing gameplay with state of the art graphics and multiplayer features to brew a mean gumbo that takes the genre to a whole 'nother level.  

Reckless Racing features a fully stocked internet multiplayer mode, on-line leaderboards and the ability to trade ghost races with other players from all over the world.

Perfectly balanced controls lets you skid, slip and slide through the most beautiful tracks ever seen on a handheld device - leaving nothing but mud-splattered opponents and skidmarks in your wake.
